name: John Greyson
biography: John Greyson (born March 13, 1960) is a Canadian director, writer, video artist, producer, and political activist, whose work frequently deals with queer themes. Greyson is also a professor at York University's film school, where he teaches film and video theory, film production, and editing. His outspoken persona, activism, and public image have also attracted international press and controversy.
